name: Happy Yak Vegetable and Peanut Pad Thai
description: Enjoy the palette pleasing zing of Pad Thai, without worrying about delivery ranges.Ingredients: rice noodles, grounded toasted peanuts, texturized soy proteins, coconut milk powder (dried coconut milk, tapioca maltodextrin,  sodium caseinate), soy sauce powder (soy, wheat, maltodextrin, salt), brown sugar, white sugar,  freeze-dried vegetables (green bean, corn, red bell pepper, pea, broccoli, carrot, water chestnut, mushroom), tomato powder, freeze-dried shallots, garlic powder, citric acidMay contain: nut, peanuts, sesame, egg, fish, sea food, mustard.
